briefTitle: Effect of the App Bone@BC Version 4.0 Under the Follow-up for Patients With Early Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effect of the App Bone@BC Version 4.0 Under the Follow-up for Patients With Early Breast Cancer - a Non-inferiority 2-year Randomized Controlled Trial (The BELIEVE@BC -Better Life Even After Breast Cancer Study)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Changes in Quality of life measured by the European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal women
* Age 50-70 years
* Danish speaking
* Diagnosed with EBC, stage I-III
* Eligible to receive (neo-) adjuvant chemotherapy or adjuvant treatments
* Access to an E-mail address
* Access to smart mobile electronic devices connected to the internet
* Willingness to have the app installed on the smart mobile electronic devices
* Ability to work with the app

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior malignancy
* Pre-existing type 2 diabetes or other metabolic diseases
* Withdrawn or not given a consent form
